nodes.text: The kyber crystal research team was a division of the Tarkin Initiative that specialized in the study of Force-attuned kyber crystals. The research team was led by the brilliant scientist Doctor Galen Erso.
The kyber crystal research team first appeared in the 2016 anthology film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Concept artwork of the team's uniforms was included in The Art of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
